 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַב‎</span>] **verb** ==cut off, shear== (?) (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָצַב‎</span> ***decide, determine***, **Pi\`el** ***chop*** meat; Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קצבא‎</span> ***butcher***, so Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Jewish-Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קַצָּכָא‎</span>, and Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> as loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>258</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> also is ***cut off*** a branch); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִקְצָכעֵץֿ‎</span> [[2Kgs.6.6|2Kgs 6:6]] ***he cut off a stick; Passive participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵדֶר הַקְּצוּבוֺת‎</span> [[Song.4.2|Song 4:2]] ***a flock of*** (sheep) ***that are shorn*** (?).
